data.title: Online Serbian Business Directory : privredni
data.text:
In our complete offer of business editions the most important is the Internet presentation of the Serbian Business Directory in Serbian and in English.

Online Serbian Business Directory is one of the most visited website from the category of B2B portals in Serbia and the number of visitors is constantly increasing over the years.

The aim of the Internet presentation of the Serbian Business Directory, in the package with the printed and electronic editions, is to provide all the basic business information to all use categories, to influence the flow of information by its dynamics, to increase the percentage of data accuracy and improve the service of browsing the database of active business entities from Serbia. All the information gathered by the publisher through field and telephone surveys is regularly undated in the database and transferred to the database on the server of the Online Serbian Business Directory.

Browser of the Online Serbian Business Directory

The browser of the Serbian Business Directory is the most important tool for the access to the information from the database of the Serbian Business Directory. In addition to defined searches by activity, by place and by firm name (ABC), the Browser offers to its users a possibility to filter information using key words, by activity and by places. These search criteria may be used individually or together in various combinations.

The algorithm used by the Browser of the Serbian Business Directory has a function to find, according to given criteria, and show the results from the database of the Serbian Business Directory, but also to favour the business entities advertised in the Serbian Business Directory by showing the information on such companies and organisation as top search results.

Advertising in the Online Serbian Business Directory

In addition to their advertisements and space on the pages of the Serbian Business Directory in the Serbian language, advertisers from Serbia will also have free translation of their advertisements into English and adequate presentation on the pages intended for international visitors of the website in English.

To order an advertisement on the website of the Serbian Business Directory, please send an email with information about your company and specify the type of an advertisement or package you are interested in to the following email address:

marketing@b2b-serbia.com

You will promptly receive our reply with the complete instructions and offer. Once you confirm your order, you will receive an invoice with the payment instructions.
